name: Pushed-01
description:
Welcome to “Lablobtories of the Evolution”' -Blob creation and training center-. It's been a long time since anyone passed through here. The last time someone came in, he stayed to help me with this great experiment! You are willing to help as well,  right?

Pushed-01 is a local multiplayer party game focused on giving the same experience to every blob, are you ready to help us in the evolution?

Single player is not supported. From 2 to 4 players, the more you are the funnier it gets!
